void Debug::DumpObj ( byte *  data,
size_t  len 
) [static] 

00092                                           {
00093         Debug::Log("Dumping %u bytes of object at %X\n", len, data);
00094 
00095         Debug::Log(" 00000 |");
00096         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00097                 Debug::Log(" %02X |", rem);
00098         }
00099         Debug::Log("\n\n");
00100         for(DWORD dec = 0; dec < len / 0x10; ++dec) {
00101                 Debug::Log(" %04X0 |", dec);
00102                 for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00103                         Debug::Log(" %02X |", data[dec * 0x10 + rem]);
00104                 }
00105                 for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00106                         byte sym = data[dec * 0x10 + rem];
00107                         Debug::Log("%c", isprint(sym) ? sym : '?');
00108                 }
00109                 Debug::Log("\n");
00110         }
00111 
00112         DWORD dec = len / 0x10 * 0x10;
00113         DWORD remlen = len - dec;
00114         Debug::Log(" %05X |", dec);
00115         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < remlen; ++rem) {
00116                 Debug::Log(" %02X |", data[dec + rem]);
00117         }
00118         for(DWORD rem = remlen; rem < 0x10; ++rem) {
00119                 Debug::Log(" -- |");
00120         }
00121         for(DWORD rem = 0; rem < remlen; ++rem) {
00122                 byte sym = data[dec + rem];
00123                 Debug::Log("%c", isprint(sym) ? sym : '?');
00124         }
00125         Debug::Log("\nEnd of dump.\n");
00126 }

void Debug::DumpStack ( REGISTERS *  R,
size_t  len 
) [static] 

00128                                               {
00129         Debug::Log("Dumping %X bytes of stack\n", len);
00130         for(size_t i = 0; i < len; i += 4) {
00131                 Debug::Log("esp+%04X = %08X\n", i, R->Stack32(i));
00132         }
00133         Debug::Log("Done.\n");
00134 }
